item.description: Yidan(Rebecca) Gao +86 133301117177 | gaoyidan99@163.com | LinkedIn EDUCATION Cornell University | Aug 2022 - Dec 2023(Expected) Master of Engineering in Operations Research and Information Engineering - Data Analytics Core Coursework: Machine Learning, Consulting Case Study, Data-Driven Marketing, Supply Chain Management, Data Mining, Big Data Technology, Database Management and Programming, Financial Engineering, Game Theory University of Illinois Urbana Champaign (UIUC) | Aug 2018 - May 2022 Bachelor of Engineering in Industrial Engineering in Economics and Finance Track (major); Statistics (minor)
